ISSUE.TITLE: make fails to find "rice" in the path and the build exits
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The Makefile has a rice target: ``` rice: go get github.com/GeertJohan/go.rice/rice go build github.com/GeertJohan/go.rice/rice ``` The make failed because this wasn't in my path on the system. My solution was to add one more line to the rice dep: ``` go install github.com/GeertJohan/go.rice/rice ``` which placed the binary in my $GOPATH/bin and thus the build could continue.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: [code-767]: fixed space filtering on space selector (#395)
